languages.text: "А грешники — превыше прочих. Чем грандиознее проступок, тем чудеснее и удивительнее раскаяние".
"And it is true for miscreants above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."
languages.original_text: "А грешники — превыше прочих. Чем грандиознее проступок, тем чудеснее и удивительнее раскаяние".

traits.locale_text: "And it is true for sinners above all else. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and fascinating the repentance."
"And it is true for sinners above all else. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and fascinating the repentance."
"And it is true for sinners above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."
"And it is true for sinners above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."
"And it is true for miscreants above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."

languages.text: “对过错之人而言，尤为如此。他们犯下的罪过越是严重，他们的忏悔就越是不可思议。”
languages.original_text: "And it is true for miscreants above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."

traits.locale_text: “对罪人而言，尤为如此。他们犯下的罪过越是严重，他们的忏悔就越是不可思议。”

languages.text: «Y eso es doblemente cierto para los criminales. Cuanto mayor es su transgresión, más milagroso y maravilloso es el arrepentimiento».
languages.original_text: "And it is true for miscreants above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."

traits.locale_text: «Y eso es doblemente cierto para los pecadores. Cuanto mayor es el pecado, más milagroso y maravilloso es el arrepentimiento».

languages.text: 「特に悪党であればなおさらです。罪が大きければ大きいほど、悔い改めることが奇跡的で神秘的なものとなります」
languages.original_text: "And it is true for miscreants above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."

traits.locale_text: 「特に罪人であればなおさらです。罪が大きければ大きいほど、悔い改めることが奇跡的で神秘的なものとなります」

languages.text: "Und das gilt vor allem für Missetäter. Je größer die Verfehlung, desto wundersamer und wunderbarer die Buße."
languages.original_text: "And it is true for miscreants above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."

traits.locale_text: "Und das gilt vor allem für Sünder. Je größer die Verfehlung, desto wundersamer und wunderbarer die Buße."

languages.text: « Et c'est d'autant plus vrai pour les mécréants. Plus la transgression est grande, plus la repentance est merveilleuse et miraculeuse. »
languages.original_text: "And it is true for miscreants above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."

traits.locale_text: « Et c'est d'autant plus vrai pour les pécheurs. Plus la transgression est grande, plus la repentance est merveilleuse et miraculeuse. »

languages.text: "Bu, kötü kimseler için daha da geçerli. Günahları ne kadar büyükse onları telafi etme çabaları da o kadar mucizevi ve harikulade olur."
languages.original_text: "And it is true for miscreants above all others. The greater the transgression, the more miraculous and wondrous the repentance."

traits.locale_text: "Bu, kötü kimseler için daha da geçerli. Günahları ne kadar büyükse, onları telafi etme çabaları da o kadar mucizevi ve harikulade olur."
